column10: rather than adds to the film. Tried to be something Saw isn't meant to be.|  Is Jigsaw an amazing masterpiece of film? No. Is it good enough to warrant a sequel? Maybe. Is it the best in the series? Definitely not. Jigsaw's production promised a movie worthy of calling itself a part of the Saw franchise but failed at delivering this promise. There are many glaring plotholes with timing and technology advancements that makes the viewer wish for a sequel but at the same time there is just not enough excitement in this series for anyone to care.|  This film is not perfect. column11: however I will say that the SAW series is exceptionally well thought out. The most intriguing part is that someone could really do this. There are so many people who take life for granted that this series makes one wonder
